attributes.action: Reduce Public Transport Prices for Students
attributes.additional_details:
Bus prices are forever rising, buss fair is currently £1.50 for age 16 +.  Students who go to college are usually unemployed and have to depend on parents for travel money, £1.50 one way is ridiculous.
The government should help reduce the price of PUBLIC TRANSPORT, especially for students, there should offer special deals. Subsides PUBLIC TRANSPORT
